snippet.title: Pneumata VR - Official Gameplay Trailer | Perp Games VR Summer Showcase 2023
snippet.description: A pig's head and a tour of unsettling, darkly lit locations take the spotlight in this latest gameplay trailer for Pneumata VR. Pneumata VR is the virtual reality version of the upcoming survival and psychological horror game in which you play a detective desperately trying to piece together their fractured memories. Pneumata VR is coming to PlayStation VR2 in 2023.
